HERO_DESCRIPTION: Fast, reliable software that puts your community first.
IMAGE_CAPTION: 20 years ago when companies had offices.
PARAGRAPH_1: Headquartered in California, USA, FastComments is committed on providing high quality, performant, privacy focused discussion software.
PARAGRAPH_2: All software is written in the US. We are a small family-run company.
PARAGRAPH_3: Reliable and fast software takes a lot of love to create. We hope you see that in FastComments.
PARAGRAPH_4: We are committed to making our on-boarding process as seamless as possible. When you sign up for FastComments, your account is assigned to a developer and most communication will go through them. Don't be afraid to ask technical questions or help with customizations.
PARAGRAPH_5: If you have any questions at all, or have an RFP, feel free to reach out to us.
HQ_LOCATION: Folsom and San Jose, CA, United States of America
